timeline.bodyText: Wouldn't we want globalRouterOffering to take precedence over serviceOfferingId, @weizhouapache?
timeline.author: DaanHoogland

replies.bodyText: @DaanHoogland serviceOfferingId is the final offering which will be used on virtual router.
replies.author: weizhouapache

replies.bodyText: yes, but if we configured a global router offering wouldn't we prefer that even if serviceOfferingId is not null?
replies.author: DaanHoogland

replies.bodyText:
@DaanHoogland correct. it checks following offerings

Router service Offering of network/vpc offering
Account route service offering
Global route service offering
Default route offering

If 1 or 2 is set and validated, global setting will not be used.
